name: The Fairy Forest (One Hour Game Jam 66)
name_original: The Fairy Forest (One Hour Game Jam 66)
description:
You're a tiny little fairy that's trying to fly as far and fast as possible in the forest.

This is a tiny side scrolling obstacle avoidance game made in a hour using Pico-8, for the 66th One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'don't touch me'.

Instructions

  • Use the up and down arrow keys to avoid the thick forest trees.
  • Try to get the highest score possible!
